pkgmetadata.longdescription: Goodness-of-Fit Tests using Kernelized Stein Discrepancy // An adaptation of Kernelized Stein Discrepancy, this package provides a goodness-of-fit test of whether a given i.i.d. sample is drawn from a given distribution. It works for any distribution once its score function (the derivative of log- density) can be provided. This method is based on "A Kernelized Stein Discrepancy for Goodness-of-fit Tests and Model Evaluation" by Liu, Lee, and Jordan, available at http://arxiv.org/abs/1602.03253.
